blogs.title: Journey to south
blogs.body: My travel to south. The United States, which took a forceful stance on other Arab revolts, remained relatively passive in the face of the kingdomâ€™s unrest and crackdown. To many who are familiar with the region, this came as no surprise: of all the Arab states that saw revolts last year, Bahrain is arguably the most closely tied to American strategic interests.
blogs.author: Mario

blogs.title: Journey to east
blogs.body: My travel to east. The bizarre tale of how the hiring of a reality TV contestant to greet high-end customers led to the firing of a successful CEO. Plus: a follow-up article.
blogs.author: Yoshida
